page.title: 01HOME LIFE
page.content:
A Typical Day In The Life of Colonel Stanton - Local Landowner
Colonel Stanton rises between six and seven am dresses and goes down stairs to switch off the burglar alarm.He excercises his dogs, has breakfast and reads his diary to help plan his day. About 8.00 am he see's all his workmen in the yard and they plan their days work. He spends the time before lunch attending to estate business and his mail.In the afternoons he visits his tenant farmers to discuss the maintenance of the farms. He is now chairman of the National Trust (East Midlands) and also Chairman of the Derbyshire County Land Owners Association,Deputy Lieutenant and is on the Derbyshire Rural Community Council.
